title: Interview with Barrie Schwortz in Intrepid
post:
This is kind of an old interview since it was done in 2010.  Nevertheless, it was a pretty good one and everyone should listen to it.  Here’s the link to listen it : http://deadreckoning.planetparanormal.com/
It much better to hear Barrie live than to read a transcript of an interview he did, don’t you think ?
author: Yannick Clément
